This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] transceiver.stop() on one side (without renegotiation) causes mute events on the other
  assert_true: Timed out waiting for mute expected true got false
[FAIL] pc.close() on one side causes mute events on the other
  assert_true: Timed out waiting for mute expected true got false
Harness: the test ran to completion.
